title: Can I tell you a secret? Episode three: the man upstairs
description: Revisited: who is Matthew Hardy? Journalist Sirin Kale looks for clues about what motivates this cyberstalker to create chaos and fear in so many people’s lives. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Can I tell you a secret? Episode three: the man upstairs
